alert.note: Alert for Central Plaquemines; Coastal Jefferson; Eastern Orleans; Lower Jefferson; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard; St. Charles; Upper Jefferson; Upper Lafourche; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 4:58PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central St. Bernard, St. Charles, southwestern Orleans, northeastern Lafourche, Jefferson and northwestern Plaquemines Parishes through 545 PM CDT... At 458 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm east of Metairie, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Orleans, Chalmette, Avondale, Metairie, Marrero, Harvey, Timberlane, Belle Chasse, Jefferson, Gretna, Harahan, Westwego, Jean Lafitte, Luling, Poydras, River Ridge, Myrtle Grove, Ama, Destrehan and Estelle. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 215 and 243. Interstate 310 between mile markers 1 and 8. Interstate 610 between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
